decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The approved materials shall not alter from those indicated on the amended drawing no 03, which was received by the Council on the 9 April 2010, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 4.1 and 4.10 of the Ealing Unitary Development Plan, Plan for the Environment (2004). | Notwithstanding any indications as to these matters submitted within the application, the shutters used shall be the open lattice style shutter only, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.   REASON: 	To protect the character and amenity of the surrounding area in accordance with Policies 4.1 and 4.10 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). |  Notwithstanding any indications as to these matters submitted within the application, the awning shall be located no closer than 2.4m to the pavement, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  REASON: To protect the amenities of pedestrians of the area, in accordance with policy 4.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Replacement shopfront including the installation of a new awning and open grille shutters
